title: Drawing, "Design for Wainscotting for the Exposition des Arts Decoratifs (No. 6)", ca. 1925
dimensions: 28 x 30 cm (11 in. x 11 13/16 in.), irregular
description: Design for wainscotting for the Exposition des Arts Decoratifs. The design shows a window in the center with decorative moulding at the upper corners. On either side of the window are cloumn-like designs with abstracted floral motifs at the tops and bottoms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Wainscotting for the Exposition des Arts Decoratifs (No. 6)", ca. 1925.
ca. 1925. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-86.
